verses.text: \w My|strong="H1732"\w* soul rests \w in|strong="H5921"\w* God alone. \w My|strong="H1732"\w* salvation [yeshuah-ti] \w is|strong="H1732"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w He|strong="H4480"\w* \w alone|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* rock, \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* fortress. \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* never \w be|strong="H5315"\w* greatly shaken.

\w How|strong="H3444"\w* \w long|strong="H7227"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* assault \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man? \w Would|strong="H7227"\w* all \w of|strong="H6697"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* throw \w him|strong="H1931"\w* \w down|strong="H4131"\w*, \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* leaning wall, \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* tottering fence?

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w fully|strong="H5921"\w* intend \w to|strong="H5704"\w* throw \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w down|strong="H5186"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* lofty \w place|strong="H3605"\w*. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* delight \w in|strong="H5921"\w* lies. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* bless \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* mouth, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* curse inwardly. \qs Selah.\qs*

\w My|strong="H7130"\w* soul, wait \w in|strong="H7130"\w* silence \w for|strong="H7130"\w* God alone, \w for|strong="H7130"\w* \w my|strong="H7130"\w* expectation \w is|strong="H6310"\w* from \w him|strong="H7130"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w alone|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* rock \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* salvation [yeshuah-ti], \w my|strong="H3588"\w* fortress. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* shaken.

\w My|strong="H3808"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \w and|strong="H6697"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* honor \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w with|strong="H4131"\w* \w God|strong="H6697"\w*. \w The|strong="H3808"\w* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* \w of|strong="H6697"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* \w strength|strong="H6697"\w*, \w and|strong="H6697"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4869"\w*, \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H6697"\w*.

\w Trust|strong="H4268"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* times, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* people. Pour \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w God|strong="H6697"\w* \w is|strong="H3519"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*. \qs Selah.\qs*

Surely \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* low degree \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w just|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* breath, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* high degree \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lie. \w In|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* balances \w they|strong="H6256"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H5971"\w* \w up|strong="H8210"\w*. \w They|strong="H6256"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w together|strong="H5971"\w* lighter \w than|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* breath.

Don’t trust \w in|strong="H1121"\w* oppression. Don’t \w become|strong="H3162"\w* \w vain|strong="H1892"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* robbery. \w If|strong="H1121"\w* riches increase, don’t \w set|strong="H5927"\w* \w your|strong="H5927"\w* heart \w on|strong="H5927"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.

God \w has|strong="H3820"\w* spoken once; twice \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w heard|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w power|strong="H2428"\w* belongs \w to|strong="H3820"\w* God.

\w Also|strong="H5797"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, Lord, belongs loving kindness, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* reward \w every|strong="H3588"\w* man according \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* work.
